head.title: Extract text from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdShortName}} to extract plain or structured text from {{FileFormatUp}} files in {{ProgLang}} applications without needing external tools.

header.title: Extract text from {{FileFormatUp}} using {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Quickly extract readable and structured text from PDFs, Word, Excel, and other file types using {{ProdShortName}} in your {{EnvNameShort}} solutions.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a high-performance document parsing API for {{EnvName}} developers. It simplifies extracting text, images, tables, and structured content from multiple file formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more—without depending on third-party libraries.

formats.title: Supported formats for text extraction
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} enables text extraction from a wide array of document and image types. Explore the commonly supported formats listed below.

examples.comment_2: Extract all text content from the file
examples.comment_3: If the text is unavailable, the result will be null
examples.comment_4: Use the extracted text in your application
examples.comment_5: Text extraction is unsupported for this format

steps.title: Steps to extract text from {{FileFormatCap}} in {{ProgLang}}

content.title: You can extract clean and structured text from {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps with [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) by following these steps:
content.step_1: Open the {{FileFormatUp}} document using a {{textParser}} instance.
content.step_2: Extract the text from the file content.
content.step_3: Check the result to confirm text extraction was successful.
content.step_4: Use the extracted text in your business logic, indexing, or data pipelines.

more_features.title: Comprehensive content extraction features
more_features.description: In addition to plain text, {{ProdShortName}} can extract images, structured elements, and metadata to support content analysis, transformation, and automation.
more_features.image_description: Text recognition and structured document parsing

feature_1.title: Text extraction across various file types
feature_1.content: Get plain or structured text from formats like PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, HTML, and other formats.

feature_2.title: Process text from documents and visuals
feature_2.content: Extract text from scanned images, presentations, spreadsheets, and digital documents while preserving structure.

feature_3.title: Advanced text extraction configuration
feature_3.content: Customize how text is detected—define page ranges, layout regions, and adjust output for maximum accuracy.

code_1.title: How to extract text areas from a PPTX file
code_1.content: This code sample shows how to retrieve text content along with area coordinates from a PowerPoint file using {{ProdShortName}}.
code_1.comment_2: Extract all text area rectangles from the document
code_1.comment_3: Exit if text area extraction is not available
code_1.comment_4: Loop through each page's text areas
code_1.comment_5: Access page index, area rectangle, and text value
